Author: Glass Lion Charlie
Name: Neevie Auto-Mammet Emote Generator
Punchline: Now you too can be annoyed to death by a mammet that spews quotes at you.
Description: Neevie Auto-Mammet Emote Generator accepts a series of quotes provided by you, the user. A random quote is selected and inserted into the emote, and the emote is split into chunks if the string is too long to fit in a single emote.
